name: twitter-multi-user-monitor
description: Twitter多用户监控系统，支持多API凭证轮换、智能时间调度和钉钉通知

scripts.auth: node -e "import('./src/monitors/twitter/TwitterAuthenticator.js').then(m => { const auth = new m.TwitterAuthenticator(); auth.initializeDatabase().then(() => auth.authenticateAllCredentials()); })"
scripts.auth:check: node -e "import('./src/monitors/twitter/TwitterAuthenticator.js').then(m => { const auth = new m.TwitterAuthenticator(); auth.initializeDatabase().then(() => auth.checkAuthenticationStatus()); })"
